N. JeyakodiSunilParamuSarithaEaswariYogi BabuKumarMonisha BlessyRajiMadhan Kumar DhakshinamoorthyDhanrajDouglas KumaramoorthyJunior EngineerMinor YogiThannarasuSemmalar AnnamSelviPalani MuruganPaguthiBalaji SakthivelChief MinisterDileepanDevanesanVijayalakshmi VeeramaniDevanesan's WifePazhani MuruganPaguthiVainavashriDevanesan's KidSuresh ChakravarthiPsychiatristDirectorMadonne AshwinWriterMadonne AshwinAll cast & crewProduction, box office & more at IMDbProMore like this7.9Thiruchitrambalam6.7Mark Antony7.0Miss Shetty Mr Polishetty8.0Por Thozhil5.4Kushi8.3Viduthalai Part 17.9Badhaai ho8.0Haider6.7Maamannan7.3Badri6.1King of Kotha8.0Ayyappanum KoshiyumStorylineEditDid you knowEditConnectionsReferences Stranger Than Fiction (2006)SoundtracksScene%20Ah%20Scene%20Ah%20Written by Kabilan%2C%20CM%20LokeshPerformed by Anirudh%20Ravichander%20User reviews70ReviewReviewFeatured review7/10 Interesting usage of Voice Overs!I have never seen such unique usage of voiceovers/narrations before; In mainstream entertainers, they are primarily used in flashback scenes or to build anticipation around the central character, but the way 'Maaveeran' used this specific trope is quite intriguing, to say the least.Not to mention, the action or the choreography, to be precise, seemed slightly refreshing as well. The way in which the camera moves and captures every kick and punch; it feels swell and looks damn cool. Some credit must also go to Sivakarthikeyan, who played his part with such unabashed conviction. Nobody else would have done a better job; he looked like an ideal fit for this role.My only major complaint is its 156 minutes duration; it sometimes felt unnecessarily long. Other than that, it's a respectable commercial venture, a familiar dish, albeit served with a distinctive recipe and a much different flavour.helpful•31SoumikBanerjee1996Aug 12, 2023Top picksSign in to rate and Watchlist for personalized recommendationsSign inFAQ14How long is Maaveeran?Powered by AlexaDetailsEditRelease dateJuly 14, 2023 (India)Country of originIndiaLanguagesTeluguTamilAlso known asMahaveeruduProduction companyShanthi TalkiesSee more company credits at IMDbProBox officeEditGross worldwide$406,663See detailed box office info on IMDbProTechnical specsEditRuntime2 hours 43 minutesColorColorAspect ratio2.39 : 1Related newsContribute to this pageSuggest an edit or add missing contentTop GapWhat is the Spanish language plot outline for Maaveeran (2023)?AnswerSee more gapsLearn more about contributingEdit pageMore to exploreListJanuary Picks: All the Best Movies and ShowsSee our picksListThe Most Anticipated Movies of 2024See the listListJames' 5 Picks for JanuarySee the full listRecently viewedYou have no recently viewed pagesGet the IMDb AppSign in for more accessSign in for more accessGet the IMDb AppHelpSite IndexIMDbProBox Office MojoIMDb DeveloperPress RoomAdvertisingJobsConditions of UsePrivacy PolicyYour Ads Privacy ChoicesIMDb, an Amazon company© 1990-2024 by IMDb.com, Inc.Back to top
